narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Re-focus Inc. is a Day Training  Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Providence, RI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $102.5M in Medicaid payments across 67K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $102.5M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,812 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
